author: spepping
msg: This change allows users to set the level of the javadocs task to
private, package or public. It also allows users to set a user
hyphenation directory from which hyphenation files are compiled and
added to the hyph directory in the build.

author: gmazza
msg: 1.) fo:retrieve marker layout initialization moved from AddLMVisitor to RetrieveMarker class.
2.) New PageNumberCitationLayoutManager class created, layout logic imported from fo.flow.PageNumberCitation to this new class.

author: gmazza
msg: Created a BitSet indicating FO's that can contain fo:marker child elements,
removed all containsMarkers() methods from FObj subclasses.

author: gmazza
msg: Implemented getNameId() which returns the Constants enumeration ID
for the FO.  For future array work or to reduce the amount of string comparisons being done.

author: gmazza
msg: Moved fo:page-number layout code from AddLMVisitor to new PageNumberLayoutManager class.
